title: Cloud Computing
pageDescription: VK Cloud Servers is a cloud computing service for managing virtual machines on the VK Cloud platform. Includes management of VM configurations, disks, images, backups, allows you to create a file storage.
shortDescription: Rent a cloud server, file and block storage, unlimited support for applications and services
metaDescription: VK Cloud Servers is a cloud computing service for managing virtual machines on the VK Cloud
markdown: VK Cloud Servers is a cloud computing service for managing virtual machines on the VK Cloud platform. Includes management of VM configurations, disks, images, backups, allows you to create a file storage.
